detail_desc: Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a lined hood, cable-knit front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a shawl collar, draped front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, opening with a button at the back of the neck and seam with a flounce at the hem.
Sweatpants in a regular fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, welt side pockets and a welt back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sweatpants in a regular fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, welt side pockets and a welt back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow shoulder straps that cross and the back, and ties at the back.

Long shirt in an airy chiffon weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an asymmetric hem with slits in the sides.

Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with elastication and a tie at the waist, and frilled hems.
Straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
